subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: It had been 75 years since the Red Sox allowed as many hits to the Yankees as they did on Friday night. But David Ortiz and the Red Sox flipped the storyline on the Yankees on Saturday.
snippet: It had been 75 years since the Red Sox allowed as many hits to the Yankees as they did on Friday night. But David Ortiz and the Red Sox flipped the storyline on the Yankees on Saturday.
